column4: does anyone have a command to rename ".JPG_original" backups to the corresponding ".JPG" with overwriting the current .JPG files(which are broken). i tried mv *.JPG_original *.JPG (sorry if it hurts the pros around here) but i guess i need a for loop to preserve filenames?
oh there is a rename command..thanks escott
how would rename one file with overwriting? "mv original1.JPG_backup original1.JPG"?
